title: Art Blakey / THE JAZZ MESSENGER / 1956 Columbia
description:
This 1991 Columbia compilation draws music from (3) 1956 Columbia LPs: 



1) ART BLAKEY WITH THE ORIGINAL JAZZ MESSENGERS   w/Donald Byrd, Hank Mobley

2) ORIGINALLY                                     w/Ira Sullivan  (released 1982)

3) HARD BOP                                       w/Bill Hardman, Jackie McLean



Horace Silver plays piano on 4 of the 8 tracks.  Track #1 ECAROH is HORACE

spelled backwards. It is one of many titles of the period so encrypted.


One reviewer described this CD as "non-essential" but Messenger fans will disagree.

Somebody should upload A NIGHT AT BIRDLAND.....no doubt about IT'S importance.
